data.name: HSBC Premier World Mastercard
data.description: Be rewarded for being an HSBC Premier customer. Earn HSBC Rewards Plus points on your everyday spend to redeem for cashback, gift cards and more with a $0 annual fee.

bundles.name: HSBC Premier
bundles.description: HSBC Premier is a global banking and wealth management service that offers customers day to day banking, international recognition, worldwide assistance, investment expertise, rewards and privileges.

features.additionalValue: You will receive credit card access with this product.

features.additionalInfo: This product is eligible for a fee-free additional card.
Earn 1.5 Rewards Plus points for every $1 spent on eligible purchases, up to $120,000 annually.

features.additionalValue: Enjoy Domestic and International Travel Insurances with rental vehicle insurance excess cover, Transit Accident Insurance, Extended Warranty Insurance and Purchase Protection Insurance. Cover for claims relating to Covid-19 may be available under selected International travel insurance benefits.

features.additionalInfo: 0% p.a. interest on balance transfers for 12 months (when requested at card application) with a 2% balance transfer fee.
Up to 55 interest-free days on purchases.
Apple Pay can be used wherever you can make contactless purchases, online, and at participating retailers in store.

features.additionalValue: Free membership of Frequent Values by Entertainment Publications gives you access to 4,500 exciting offers at participating stores, restaurants, hotels and family attractions when you use your card.
Get a 10% discount on selected pre-pay stand-alone Expedia hotel bookings every time you pay with your HSBC Premier Mastercard.
Two complimentary airport lounge passes each calendar year with Mastercard Travel Pass provided by DragonPass.

features.additionalInfo: Google Pay can be used wherever you can make contactless purchases, online, and at participating retailers in store.

constraints.additionalInfo: The minimum credit limit on this credit card.
The maximum credit limit on this credit card.

eligibility.additionalInfo: To qualify for HSBC Premier, you'll need to have an HSBC Everyday Global Account, as well as either maintain regular 'money in' deposits totalling AUD9,000 into your account each month, or maintain a savings balance of AUD150,000.
Minimum age required to apply for this credit card.
Minimum income required to apply for this credit card.

fees.name: Overlimit Arrangement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when your informal request for a credit limit increase is agreed.

fees.name: Late Payment Reminder Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on or after the day an amount is due for payment and has not been paid.

fees.name: Overseas Transaction Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you make a transaction on your account in a currency other than Australian dollars, or you make a transaction on your account in any currency (including Australian dollars) that is processed/billed by either the merchant or its financial institution/payment processor outside of Australia.

fees.name: Cash Advance Usage Charge
fees.additionalInfo: The higher of $4 or 3.0% of the total transaction amount (including any fees and charges imposed by us or a third party to effect the transaction). The cash advance usage charge forms part of the cash advance balance.

fees.name: Balance Transfer Handling Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This will be calculated as a percentage of the balance being transferred to your HSBC credit card account. This fee will be applied at the time the balance is transferred and forms part of your outstanding balance.
